title: SOLD: 1905 John McGraw PC - Callie Bros.
author: rholmes

posts.post_title: SOLD: 1905 John McGraw PC - Callie Bros.
posts.post_content:
SOLD: Scarce Callie Bros. 1905 postcard, "You're a Knocker" featuring John McGraw. VG+ condition, postally unused. The basis for the illustration of McGraw was taken from photos taken of the Giants at spring training, 1903. I've only ever seen one other example of this pc for sale, at Bagger's Auctions a couple of years ago where it sold for $241 with B/P.

Price: $SOLD

PM or email with interest.

Email: semloh00 @ yahoo.com

Thx,
Ray
